Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: ~tkuhrt - If we do that, can we get rid of the big *ugly* CC license text in the top left of the navigation? Seems like overkill to have the CC license in the nav and having it on the license page.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: My preference would be remove the license.rst altogether. It adds no value. The LICENSE speaks for itself. As for the ugly ccby in the RTD margin, someone needs to fix the CSS. Maybe we can get Sean or someone on that.
